#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

long sum(long n)
{

  long sum=0;

  while(n!=0)
  {

    sum=sum+n%10;
    n=n/10;

  }

  return sum;

}

int main()
{

  int t,flag;
  long encore,i,n;

  cin>>t;
  cout<<endl;

  while(t--)
  {

    cin>>n;

    flag=0;

    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {

     if( i+sum(i) == n)
     {

       encore=i;
       flag=1;
       break;

     }

    }

    if(flag==1)
    cout<<encore<<endl;

    else cout<<"NONE"<<endl;

  }

  return 0;

}
